job_title: Senior Angular or TypeScript developer with AEM experience
jd: From: Chandra Sekhar Prathipati, Yochana IT Solutions chandra@yochana.com Reply to: chandra@yochana.com Hi,This is Chandra from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for “Senior Angular/TypeScript developer with AEM experience, Frisco, TX(Onsite)” with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.Job Description:5+ years of experience in frontend development with a focus on Angular, TypeScript, and JavaScript.3+ years of experience in Java development for backend integration.Experience working with AEM (Adobe Experience Manager).
